Title: New Lions coach Dan Campbell says he's OK being a 'meathead' with 'limited brain capacity'
Description: Of all the head coaching hires to start the 2021 NFL offseason, not one introduced themselves quite like Dan Campbell. The former NFL veteran, now tabbed to lead the Detroit Lions, stole the spotlight in his first remarks as the club's head man,
Author: CBSSports.com on MSN.com
